Description
Enter the world of Steampunk Adventure and find the stolen "light" from your city.
Steampunk Adventure is a shooter platform game in a steampunk style: help the hero to find the way out of the labyrinth to complete the game and restore the light in the Endelamp city.

Defeat the robots and fight the boss monster! Find the mazes exits! Use different weapons, follow the white rabbit to find the right way! out!

10 different levels, many robots!!

Languages
English, Italian

Controls
Steampunk Adventure is best played using only the left analogstick of an Xbox 360 Controller but you can also use WSAD or arrow-keys:

  • ESC : back, quit, pause
  • WSAD or arrows : move the character, menu selection
  • LEFTALT or RIGHTALT or ENTER or SPACE: shoot, run selected menu
  • K-L or ( Z-X ): switch weapons

On a MacOSX system, you can use an XBOX 360 Controller: you should install an external driver to use it (i.e. https://github.com/360Controller/360Controller/releases)

Requirements
OS: Windows XP SP2+, Mac OS X 10.8+, Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+.
Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
NOTE: Be sure to test the FREE DEMO to check out if your system is compatible with these requirements.
